targets.query:
SELECT sum(fetched)  / sum(returned) from
    (SELECT non_negative_difference(first("tup_fetched")) as fetched, non_negative_difference(first("tup_returned")) as returned FROM "pg_db_stats"
    WHERE ("host" =~ /^$DBHost$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY datname, time($__interval) fill(null))
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Percentage of max connections in use
targets.query: SELECT max("instance_total") / max("max_connections") FROM "pg_backends" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$DBHost$/) AND $timeFilter group by time($__interval)

select sum(seq_scans) from (SELECT non_negative_difference(first("seq_scan")) as seq_scans FROM "pg_table_stats" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$DBHost$/) AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($__interval), "table_name" fill(none)) group by time($__interval) fill(none)

select sum(idx_scans) from (SELECT non_negative_difference(first("idx_scan")) as idx_scans FROM "pg_table_stats" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$DBHost$/) AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($__interval), "table_name" fill(none)) group by time($__interval) fill(none)

select sum(hot_updates) as hot_updates from
    (SELECT non_negative_difference(first("n_tup_hot_upd")) as hot_updates FROM "pg_table_stats" 
    WHERE ("host" =~ /^$DBHost$/) AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($__interval), "table_name" fill(none))
group by time($__interval) fill(none)

select sum(inserted) as inserted from (SELECT non_negative_difference(first("n_tup_ins")) as inserted FROM "pg_table_stats" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$DBHost$/) AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($__interval), "table_name" fill(none)) group by time($__interval) fill(none)

select sum(updated) as updated from (SELECT non_negative_difference(first("n_tup_upd")) as updated FROM "pg_table_stats" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$DBHost$/) AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($__interval), "table_name" fill(none)) group by time($__interval) fill(none)

select sum(deleted) as deleted from (SELECT non_negative_difference(first("n_tup_del")) as deleted FROM "pg_table_stats" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$DBHost$/) AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($__interval), "table_name" fill(none)) group by time($__interval) fill(none)

select top(idx_scans, index_name, 5), datname from (SELECT last("idx_scan") - first("idx_scan") as idx_scans FROM "pg_index_stats" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$DBHost$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "index_name", "datname")

select bottom(idx_scans, index_name, 5), datname from (SELECT last("idx_scan") - first("idx_scan") as idx_scans FROM "pg_index_stats" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$DBHost$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "index_name", "datname")

select sum(mean) from 
    (SELECT mean("count") FROM "pg_locks_mode" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$DBHost$/) AND $timeFilter
    GROUP BY time($__interval), "lockmode", "datname" fill(null))
GROUP BY time($__interval), "lockmode" fill(null)

select sum(last) from (SELECT last("n_dead_tup") FROM "pg_table_stats" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$DBHost$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "table_name" fill(none)) group by time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Top 5 tables by most live rows

list.definition: show tag values on telegraf from pg_backends with key = host
list.name: DBHost
list.query: show tag values on telegraf from pg_backends with key = host
